entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
